anchor.title: Anchor ID
anchor.description: The HTML ID of the element the region is positioned relative to

viewport.title: Viewport ID
viewport.description: The HTML ID of the viewport the region is positioned relative to

horizontal-positioning-mode.title: Horizontal positioning mode
horizontal-positioning-mode.description: How the horizontal placement is determined

horizontal-default-position.description: The default horizontal position of the region relative to the configured 'Anchor ID'

horizontal-inset.title: Horizontal inset
horizontal-inset.description: Determines whether the region should overlap the anchor on the horizontal axis

horizontal-threshold.title: Horizontal threshold
horizontal-threshold.description: The space allocated to the default position before the widest area is selected for layout

horizontal-scaling.title: Horizontal scaling
horizontal-scaling.description: Defines how the width of the region is calculated

vertical-positioning-mode.title: Vertical positioning mode
vertical-positioning-mode.description: How the vertical placement is determined

vertical-default-position.title: Vertical default position
vertical-default-position.description: The default vertical position of the region relative to the configured 'Anchor ID'

vertical-inset.title: Vertical inset
vertical-inset.description: Determines whether the region should overlap the anchor on the vertical axis

vertical-threshold.title: Vertical threshold
vertical-threshold.description: The space allocated to the default position before the widest area is selected for layout

vertical-scaling.title: Vertical scaling
vertical-scaling.description: Defines how the width of the region is calculated

fixed-placement.title: Fixed placement
fixed-placement.description: Fixed placement allows the region to break out of parent containers

auto-update-mode.title: Auto update mode
auto-update-mode.description: Defines whether the component automatically updates its position

id.title: The ID of the data corresponding to a dictionary key

dataLocation.title: The location of the data using lodash path syntax
